data.lyric:
[ti:Dancing With Your Ghost]
[ar:Sasha Sloan]
[al:Dancing With Your Ghost]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Dancing With Your Ghost - Sasha Alex Sloan
[00:04.34]Lyrics by：Sasha Sloan
[00:08.69]Composed by：Sasha Sloan
[00:13.04]Yelling at the sky
[00:16.10]Screaming at the world
[00:19.46]Baby why'd you go away
[00:21.42]I'm still your girl
[00:25.75]Holding on too tight
[00:28.85]Head up in the clouds
[00:32.10]Heaven only knows where you are now
[00:38.61]How do I love how do I love again
[00:44.83]How do I trust how do I trust again
[00:50.26]I stay up all night
[00:52.88]Tell myself I'm alright
[00:56.04]Baby you're just harder to see than most
[01:03.06]I put the record on
[01:05.79]Wait 'til I hear our song
[01:08.92]Every night I'm dancing with your ghost
[01:15.51]Every night I'm dancing with your ghost
[01:23.44]Never got the chance
[01:26.35]To say your last goodbye
[01:29.58]I gotta move on
[01:31.68]But it hurts to try
[01:36.22]How do I love how do I love again
[01:42.48]How do I trust how do I trust again
[01:47.83]I stay up all night
[01:50.49]Tell myself I'm alright
[01:53.64]Baby you're just harder to see than most
[02:00.58]I put the record on
[02:03.26]Wait 'til I hear our song
[02:06.51]Every night I'm dancing with your ghost
[02:12.98]Every night I'm dancing with your ghost
[02:21.08]How do I love how do I love again
[02:27.31]How do I trust how do I trust again
[02:32.66]I stay up all night
[02:35.27]Tell myself I'm alright
[02:38.57]Baby you're just harder to see than most
[02:45.45]I put the record on
[02:48.15]Wait 'til I hear our song
[02:51.27]Every night I'm dancing with your ghost
[02:57.87]Every night I'm dancing with your ghost
[03:04.12]Every night I'm dancing with your ghost
data.trans:
[ti:Dancing With Your Ghost]
[ar:Sasha Sloan]
[al:Dancing With Your Ghost]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:04.34]//
[00:08.69]//
[00:13.04]向天空呼号
[00:16.10]向世界呐喊
[00:19.46]宝贝 你为何要离开
[00:21.42]我依然是你的女孩
[00:25.75]执念不忘
[00:28.85]思绪飘飞
[00:32.10]天知道你现在在哪里
[00:38.61]我该如何再爱别人
[00:44.83]我该如何再信别人
[00:50.26]我彻夜不眠
[00:52.88]自己安慰自己
[00:56.04]宝贝 你让人好难懂
[01:03.06]我播放音乐
[01:05.79]一直等到我们的歌响起
[01:08.92]每个夜晚 我都与你的幻影共舞
[01:15.51]每个夜晚 我都与你的幻影共舞
[01:23.44]没有一丝机会
[01:26.35]做最后的道别
[01:29.58]我必须向前看
[01:31.68]但这个过程让我好痛苦
[01:36.22]我该如何再爱别人
[01:42.48]我该如何再信别人
[01:47.83]我彻夜不眠
[01:50.49]自己安慰自己
[01:53.64]宝贝 你让人好难懂
